name: Devil Devour Alive
description:
Welcome to hell! Your suffering will commence in a moment...

You have been eternally damned to keep the Insatiable Devil alive by feeding him the blood of the wicked as they descend into hell.
FEATURES:

• ARCADE STYLE ACTION

• INSPIRED BY CHRISTIAN MYSTICISM AND DANTE'S INFERNO

• LO-FI RETRO INSPIRED AESTHETIC

• "TATE" MODE GAMEPLAY (VERTICAL/PORTRAIT)

• ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK

• KEYBOARD AND CONTROLLER SUPPORT

---------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------------------------------

****SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS****
Tested on Windows 10. (maybe it works on others?)

Requires 457 MB of hard drive space.

CPU/GPU: Should work on most systems that can run games from the last 5 years.

We tested it on a laptop with:
Intel i7-67XX series CPU
Nvidia 970m GPU
16GB of RAM

ESC key opens the options in game which should let you tune performance.

Keyboard and Mouse or Game Controller

High grade speakers or headphones recommended for maximum spooks.

any problems, email us info at virtuaworlds dot io.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

****HOW TO PLAY****

Use the KB arrows, analog stick, or D-Pad to collect the blood of sinners for the Insatiable Devil .

Miss 9 sinners and suffer a fate worse than death.
Share your high score online and enter the Twitter leaderboard by taking a screenshot/photo and tag us @virtuaworlds.

**** DEVELOPMENT NOTES****

This is a game jam game... software is prototype quality, but it works! There will probably be minor bugs.
We opted out of the "Graphics category" because we used some base assets to start the game as well textures built into unreal engine. Most of the assets have been changed beyond recognition except for some of textures.
Some sound assets were used for sound fx, however they have been cut up, changed, pitched and modified beyond recognition. Music is all original.
If you find issues or have questions, feel free to contact us: info at virtuaworlds.io.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

**** KNOWN ISSUES ****

Sometimes the bucket flies into the air.

Sometimes the background music doesn't stop when the game over music plays.
Ragdoll effects not working.
Background music may stop.
Menus do not work with the keyboard. Use the mouse.
